meta.title: Toxic Trait Detector | DopaBrain
meta.description: Discover your hidden toxic trait with 12 brutally honest situational questions. Everyone has one.

q1.text: Your friend gets promoted at work. Your first thought is...
q1.c: "I need to work harder now" (immediately googles self-help)

q2.text: You receive a vague text from your crush. You...
q2.c: Screenshot it for your group chat analysis

q3.b: Say "sure, no problem!" while dying inside

q4.text: A friend vents about their problems. You...
q4.a: Absorb all their emotions like a sponge
q4.b: Secretly think your problems are bigger
q4.c: Give unsolicited advice and a 5-step plan

q5.text: You made a small mistake at work. You...
q5.a: Replay it in your head for 3 weeks
q5.b: Blame it on someone else subtly
q5.c: Don't even realize it was a mistake

q6.text: Someone disagrees with you in a group chat. You...
q6.b: Leave them on read for days

q7.text: Your partner hangs out with someone attractive. You...
q7.c: Feel nothing, you're the main character

q8.text: A friend asks for honest feedback. You...

q9.text: You're organizing a group trip. You...

q10.text: Someone leaves you on read. You...
q10.b: Leave them on read for twice as long

q11.text: Your friend succeeds at something you failed at. You...
q11.a: Feel genuinely happy (after a brief mourning period)
q11.b: Absorb their happiness and feel better
q11.c: Think "my time will come, I'm different"

q12.a: Start planning the wedding in your head

overthinker.title: The Chronic Overthinker
overthinker.desc: You've already imagined 47 worst-case scenarios before finishing this sentence.

passive.title: The Passive-Aggressive Texter
passive.desc: Your 'I'm fine.' has caused more damage than most natural disasters.

mainchar.title: The Main Character
mainchar.desc: Everyone else is an NPC in your movie and you're fine with that.

sponge.title: The Emotional Sponge
sponge.desc: You absorb everyone's feelings like a human WiFi router for emotions.

control.title: The Control Freak
control.desc: Your color-coded calendar has a backup calendar just in case.

ghost.title: The Ghost
ghost.desc: You've perfected the art of disappearing right when things get real.

jealous.title: The Jealous Friend
jealous.desc: You support your friends' success... after a brief mourning period.

pleaser.title: The People Pleaser
pleaser.desc: You'd apologize for being stabbed because the knife might be uncomfortable.
